OpenAL 1.1
- License: LGPL
- Used by the sound backend "PLSoundOpenAL" (external Windows dependencies: "OpenAL32.dll" and "wrap_oal.dll")
- Download from: http://www.openal.org/
	- Windows: "Updated Summer 2009 : Version 2.0.7.0"
		- DLL version numbers:
			- OpenAL32.dll version 6.14.357.24
			- wrap_oal.dll version 2.2.0.5
	- Linux: Version 1.13.0
